item.title: Josh Freese on Returning to Nine Inch Nails After Foo Fighters Departure: “To Be Part of That Energy Again Feels Amazing”
item.description: Freese, who parted ways with Foo Fighters back in May, was NIN’s former drummer from 2005 to 2008.

item.title: Foo Fighters’ New Drummer Revealed (Exclusive)
item.description: Ilan Rubin replaces Josh Freese, who was let go from the band back in May. But there’s a twist.
